description: Torimi Fuuka is Sanae`s second daughter and the poster girl of the Genesis Caf√©. She rides an Yamaha MT-125 because she looks up to Dan. Dan recognized her talent as a rider and she has a suit like his but with different colors. She`s carefree, changes moods quickly and is always spoiled by Sanae and Eika.
name: Torimi Fuuka
